DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate clinically recommend dosage ASP7373 base comparison immunogenicity safety among three dos ASP7373 healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Immune Response ASP7373 Its Safety Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body weight : Female : ≥40.0 kg , < 70.0 kg , Male : ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg BMI : ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Healthy , judge investigator subinvestigator base result physical examination ( subjective symptom objective finding ) test obtain Scheduled receive another vaccine study period History H5 influenza infection receive H5 influenza vaccine Past history anaphylactic shock allergic reaction generalize eruption due food drug ( include vaccine ) allergy , fever ≥ 39.0°C within 2 day previous vaccination ( influenza vaccine others ) Diagnosis immune deficit past , family member ( within third degree kinship ) diagnosis congenital immunodeficiency syndrome Received schedule receive live vaccine within 28 day prior vaccination study vaccine , receive schedule receive inactivate vaccine toxoid within 7 day prior vaccination study vaccine History seizure Female subject breastfeed , pregnant , possibly pregnant , plan become pregnant study period
